name: AYURVEDIC INSPIRED SKIN CARE
description: Ayurvedic wisdom teaches that each constitutional skin personality is unique and has its own recommended beauty rituals. Solavedi Organics collection includes everything you need to cleanse, nourish, moisturize, and balance your skin based on your unique dosha and skin type. Practice your Ayurvedic beauty ritual everyday and discover beautiful skin. VATA - Regenerative Skin Care contains: Beautifying Cleansing Milk, Beautifying Exfoliating Clay Mask, Carrot Rose Cleansing Oil, Regenerative Facial Massage Oil, Organic Rose Day Cream, Rose Mint Lip Balm PITTA - Nourishing Skin Care contains: Beautifying Cleansing Milk, Beautifying Exfoliating Clay Mask, Protective Facial Massage Oil, White Orchid + Plumeria Humectant, Calendula Carrot Day Cream, Honey Pure Lip Balm KAPHA - Purifying Skin Care contains: Extra Light Daily Facial Wash, Herbal Detox Clay Mask, Clarifying Facial Massage Oil, Urban Renewal Antioxidant Toner, Into the Light Day Cream, Hone Pure Lip Balm with Basil HEALING SKIN REPAIR - Skin Repair contains: Beautifying Cleansing Milk, Extra Light Daily Facial Wash, Herbal Detox Clay Mask, Urban Renewal Antioxidant Toner, Into the Night Skin Repair Cream, Face Food ($52.00) w/tax *For more information about which skincare collection to choose, click on "Dosha & Skincare Regime" Contact us: 203 481-7866 Secure purchase through PayPal using Credit or Debit card. Price includes CT sales tax.
